roleset.name: occur, take place

example.name: in questions
example.text: What *trace* happens when you flush your toilet?

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: It is happening with young wines just coming out.
example.arg: with young wines just coming out

example.name: benefactive again
example.text: What *trace* will happen to dividend growth next year?

roleset.note: Frames file for 'happen' based on big corpus and comparison with 'exist' and 'seem'; nominal 'happening' based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls occurrence-48.3.

example.name: nominal rel: happening
example.text: If not for the happening of the " 9/11 " incident , the United States had long begun the strong suppression and attack against China .

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Its workforce happens *trace* to include its most productive members.
example.arg: [Its workforce] [*trace* to include its most productive members]

example.name: with it-support
example.text: It happens that its workforce includes its most productive members.
example.arg: that its workforce includes its most productive members

example.name: find
example.text: During his daily walk through the park John happened upon a bag of cash.
example.arg: During his daily walk through the park
